properties.name: apiEndpoint
properties.label: GovStack API Endpoint
properties.description: URL of the GovStack Processing Server API endpoint

properties.name: apiKey
properties.label: API Key
properties.description: API authentication key (leave empty if not required)

properties.name: extractionMode
properties.label: Data Extraction Mode
properties.description: How to determine which farmer record to process

properties.name: specificFarmerId
properties.label: Specific Farmer ID
properties.description: Farmer ID to process (only used if extraction mode is 'specific')

properties.name: workflowVariable
properties.label: Workflow Variable Name
properties.description: Name of workflow variable containing farmer ID

properties.name: validateBeforeSending
properties.label: Validate Before Sending
properties.description: Validate data completeness before sending to API

properties.name: updateWorkflowStatus
properties.label: Update Workflow Status
properties.description: Update workflow variables with submission result

properties.name: retryOnFailure
properties.label: Retry on Failure
properties.description: Retry API call if it fails

properties.name: connectionTimeout
properties.label: Connection Timeout (seconds)
properties.validation_message: Please enter a valid number of seconds

properties.name: readTimeout
properties.label: Read Timeout (seconds)
properties.description: Maximum time to wait for response
properties.validation_message: Please enter a valid number of seconds

properties.name: logJsonPayload
properties.label: Log JSON Payload
properties.description: Log the full JSON payload being sent (may contain sensitive data)
